name: Heresy (or: The Impossible Task of Herman the Recluse)
name_original: Heresy (or: The Impossible Task of Herman the Recluse)
description:
In Heresy (or: The Impossible Task of Herman the Recluse), your task is simple.

You must produce a tome of sufficient quality before dawn, or you will be sentenced to an arduous death by starvation by way of immurement - you will be walled in alive.

Can you make it in time? Or will you need help from the dark beyond?
